name: Project Rousseau Inc.
goal:
Project Rousseau is a charity that helps children living in communities with the greatest need in the United States reach their full potential and pursue higher education. Project Rousseau works towards this mission by providing students with comprehensive one-to-one mentoring, academics, community service, and "broadening horizons" programming. We strongly believe that academic problems rarely have academic causes, and therefore take a holistic approach to helping young people develop new aspirations and providing them with the support, resources, and opportunities required to realize them.

Project Rousseau places an emphasis Broadening Horizons programming, in which students are exposed to cultures, places, people, ideas, and careers.
euInitiatives: There are many misconceptions and a very weak understanding of the European Union in the United States. We seek to contribute to better mutual understanding while empowering our young people with exposure to European Parliament and the European Union.
